name: Pumpkinhead Is Dead!
description:
Pumpkinhead Is Dead is a Halloween-themed microgame made during the 3 day #SpookyVRJam, hosted by VR with Andrew. Developed on Oculus Quest.

FEEDBACK

Thanks for checking out the result of my first virtual reality gamejam! In order to create better VR experiences, I would appreciate your feedback. Please leave a comment or contact me directly.

CONTROLS

Grip - grab staff
Trigger - cast spell

CREDITS

Poly HP - Pumpkin
FANTASTIC - Halloween Pack
VertexFrog - Free Stylized Fantasy Weapons
JMO - Cartoon FX Free
Sound effects obtained from zapsplat.com and Freesound.org.
